name: Cat Throwing Simulator 2019
description:
Throw as many cats as possible at the procedurally generated people. Give them as much bad luck as possible!

Controls:

  • Tap A/D or Left and Right arrows to spin the cat
  • Hit Space to throw the cat

Created in 4 hours for a micro game jam

Assets from Unity Playground - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/tutorial-projects/unity-playgro...
